oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On-farm estimation of clover content of mixed swards
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, Arja
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Estimation of clover content of mixed swards is difficult in practice. We are currently in the process of developing several on-farm methods for clover content estimaton. Yield samples with known area from several points of the field are separated for clovers and grasses and weighted. The clover content of yield (% in dry matter) can be calculated with formula y=23.90Ln(number of clover plants/m² in spring) - 18.759.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The Royal Veterinary and Agricultural University
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, Arja (2004) On-farm estimation of clover content of mixed swards. Paper at: European Society for Agronomy VIII ESA congress, Copenhagen, Denmark, July 11-15, 2004.
